item.text: But understand this, that in the last days difficult times will come.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5367">lovers of themselves</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5366">lovers of money</st>, <st data-num="213" class="">boastful</st>, <st data-num="5244" class="">arrogant</st>, <st data-num="989" class="">blasphemers</st>, <st data-num="545" class="">disobedient</st> to <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st>, <st data-num="884" class="">ungrateful</st>, <st data-num="462" class="">unholy</st>,

<st data-num="794" class="">unloving</st>, <st data-num="786" class="">irreconcilable</st>, <st data-num="1228" class="">slanderers</st>, <st data-num="193">without self-control</st>, <st data-num="434" class="">savage</st>, <st data-num="865">opposed to what is good</st>,

<st data-num="4273" class="">treacherous</st>, <st data-num="4312" class="">reckless</st>, <st data-num="5187" class="">conceited</st>, <st data-num="5369">loving pleasure</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> <st data-num="5377">loving God</st>.

They will <st data-num="2192" class="">maintain</st> the <st data-num="3446">outward appearance</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="2150" class="">religion</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> will have <st data-num="720" class="">repudiated</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> <st data-num="665" class="">avoid</st> <st data-num="3778">people like these</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> some <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1744" class="">insinuate</st> themselves<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">households</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="163" class="">captivate</st> <st data-num="1133">weak women</st><n id="2" /> who are <st data-num="4987" class="">overwhelmed</st> with <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> and <st data-num="71">led along</st> by <st data-num="4164" class="">various</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">passions</st>.

Such women <st data-num="3129" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="3129" class="">seeking instruction</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st> <st data-num="3368" class="">never</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">arrive</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> a <st data-num="1922" class="">knowledge</st> of the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3739 5158">just as</st> <st data-num="2389" class="">Jannes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2387" class="">Jambres</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="436" class="">opposed</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>â€”who have <st data-num="2704" class="">warped</st> <st data-num="3563" class="">minds</st> and are <st data-num="96" class="">disqualified</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st><n id="2" />â€”<st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="436" class="">oppose</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.
But they will not go much further, for their foolishness will be obvious to everyone, just like it was with Jannes and Jambres.
You, however, have followed my teaching, my way of life, my purpose, my faith, my patience, my love, my endurance,

as well as the <st data-num="1375" class="">persecutions</st> and <st data-num="3804" class="">sufferings</st><n id="1" /> that <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="490" class="">Antioch</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2430" class="">Iconium</st>, and <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3082" class="">Lystra</st>.<n id="3" /> I <st data-num="5297" class="">endured</st> <st data-num="3634" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1375" class="">persecutions</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="4506" class="">delivered</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="2532">in fact</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="2153">godly lives</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> will be <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuted</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1114" class="">charlatans</st> will <st data-num="4298" class="">go</st> from bad <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5501" class="">worse</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4105" class="">deceiving</st> others <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> being <st data-num="4105" class="">deceived</st> themselves.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st>, <st data-num="1161">however</st>, must <st data-num="3306" class="">continue</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3739" class="">things</st> you have <st data-num="3129" class="">learned</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> are <st data-num="4104" class="">confident</st> about. You <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="3129" class="">taught</st> you<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754">how</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1025" class="">infancy</st> you have <st data-num="1492" class="">known</st> the <st data-num="2413" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="1121" class="">writings</st>, which are <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4679" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4679" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">Every</st> <st data-num="1124" class="">scripture</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="2315">inspired by God</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5624" class="">useful</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1319" class="">teaching</st>, <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1650" class="">reproof</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1882" class="">correction</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3809" class="">training</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>,
that the person dedicated to God may be capable and equipped for every good work.
